original_title: From Mono to Stereo (I miei 2 anni tra musica e follia alla rincorsa di un sogno)
overview: "From Mono to Stereo fully represents my transition from 'L' to 'R', without excluding either.  The Mike Lennon that you have known so far is just one of the facets and personalities that make me up, now you will finally be able to fully appreciate me, in my total freedom of musical and visual expression."
title: From Mono to Stereo (I miei 2 anni tra musica e follia alla rincorsa di un sogno)
